original_text: And kept the feast of unleavened bread seven days with joy: for the Lord had made them joyful, and turned the heart of the king of Assyria unto them, to strengthen their hands in the work of the house of God, the God of Israel.
korean_text: 즐거움으로 이레 동안 무교절을 지켰으니 이는 여호와께서 그들을 즐겁게 하시고 또 앗수르 왕의 마음을 그들에게로 돌려 이스라엘의 하나님이신 하나님의 성전 건축하는 손을 힘 있게 하도록 하셨음이었더라

sentences.original_text: And kept the feast of unleavened bread
for the Lord had made them joyful
and turned the heart of the king of Assyria unto them
sentences.korean_translation: 또 앗수르 왕의 마음을 그들에게로 돌이키사

sentences.original_text: to strengthen their hands in the work
